tldr: An out of bounds memory access vulnerability in the compositing feature of Google Chrome versions prior to 123.0.6312.122 allows a remote attacker, who has compromised the GPU process, to potentially escape the sandbox through specific UI gestures. (Chromium security severity: High)
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `electron` library to a patch version.
